hero.tagline: Your partner for innovative Communication, Design & E-Learning Solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Drop BT. is a dynamic and forward-thinking company dedicated to delivering high-quality communication, design, and e-learning services. With a focus on creativity, precision, and client satisfaction, we strive to exceed expectations in every project.
about.paragraph2: Our team of experts is passionate about helping businesses grow and succeed by providing tailored solutions that resonate with their target audience. From captivating visual designs to engaging educational content, we cover all aspects to elevate your brand and knowledge base.

footer.company_name: DROP Kereskedelmi és Szolgáltató Betéti Társaság

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.description: We'd love to hear from you! Please reach out with any questions or inquiries.
